summary: This mod removes the native rage animation when character is in combat\\too close with enemies.
descriptionHtml:
Warning, not native english speaker, so grammar nazi please go away.
This mod removes the native rage animation when character is in combat\\too close with enemies.

Got very annoyed with rage animations, especcially because it have made my face like in classic ffuu comics :D So i thought nobody will make it for me and did it.

This mod actually only replace anims, without any esp\'s, so i hope no discompatiblities with other mods will appear.
author: Recko
